data.name: A Centaur's Life: When All Is Said And Done, Everyone Loves Kisses. | Did You Know That a Marathon Is a Microcosm of Life?
data.short_description: It's nearly time for the school fair, and Himeno's class is putting on a play. Himeno is chosen to play the princess, and after much consideration, Nozomi is chosen to play the prince! With the guidance of the class president, Manami, preparations begin to come together. Then, when the curtain rises
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
